screen1.title: Welcome
screen1.description: Manage defects directly from the field with the iTWO 4.0 Defect Management app. A tool for conveniently recording and tracking defects on your mobile device.

screen2.title: Manage Construction Defects
screen2.description: Quality management tool for handling construction defects. Browse all defects by project and get a complete overview of all recorded defects.

screen3.title: Capture Defects On-Site
screen3.description: Record defects on the go. Specify details such as defect status, type, location and also link information to iTWO 4.0 Schedules, Activities, Business Partners and more.

screen4.title: Add Comments & Photos
screen4.description: Collaborate and share information with your co-workers by adding comments to defects. Visualize and capture defects by taking photos with your mobile device.
